MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L4  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Westminster Road, Brunswick Close and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers on site confirmed an underground cable fault outside 11 Humber Crescent. Due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.26pm on Jan 20, 2021.
